msbt.message: Hello there! It's so nice to meet you. I'm Reese, and I'm just pleased as punch that you're helping us out!
<20_0 arg="N0>N1" />And this is my hubby, my darling
<20_0 arg="P0>N1" />The name's Cyrus! Good to meetcha!
<20_0 arg="P0>N0" /><20_3 arg="0" />I just know these photos are going to be SO romanticand just in time for our anniversary.
I'm just pleased as punch that you'll be helping us out, !

Of course, we do this every year for our anniversary, but it's always special, isn't it?It's just likea slice of life from that year. <20_0 arg="N0>N1" />A delicious slicealmost as sweet as our love<20_0 arg="N1>N0" /> Right, hon?
That's right! Sweeter than the sweetest

Oh, you! Such a romantic OH! <20_3 arg="0" />Sorry, I forgot what we were doing for a second there.We just get so lost in our own little world sometimes Anyhoo!So here's what we're thinking for this year's photo sets. <10_4 />A re-creation of our entire wedding day!And you can help us by making this place feel like we're saying "I do" all over again.It'll be just like decorating your own place! Easy peasy.
Oh! I almost forgot. My amazing Cy-Guy even built some custom wedding furniture for the shoot.
Isn't that so sweet of my shmoopy? He really put his heart into 'em, so I hope you can make them work.
Just open up the Event tab to take a look and grab what you want for the shoot, OK?
What we're looking for is a cute set with plenty of pink and white.Preferably using lots of the furniture my Cy-Guy made!
Just let us know when you're ready for us to start posing. I can't wait to see what you come up with!
When you're all done with the set and we've got a few photos in the can, come talk to me, OK? <10_4 />Thanks!
Aww, thanks so much for coming back to work with us on another set of photos, .I can't wait to see how these ones turn out!

So, today I'm thinking we should take a ceremony photoin a place that looks like a wedding chapel.It'll be just like our real ceremony. Professing our love for each other in front of everyone <10_4 />So romantic!

So, we've already done the ceremony photos I think it would be fun to recreate the reception this time!Oh, we had such a big, fancy party, didn't we? So much good food, and all of our family and friends

Oh, and by the way, my handy-dandy Cy-Guy made some NEW furniture! Isn't he the best?Anyway, now you have even more to work with. Just take a look at the Event tab again.I can't wait to see what you come up with!

Oh, and by the way, my handy-dandy Cy-Guy made some NEW furniture! Isn't he the best?Anyway, now you have even more to work with. Just take a look at the Event tab again.I can't wait to see what you come up with!

Oh, ! I'm so glad to see you're back for another shoot. I've got something fun in mind!Everything has been just lovely so far, but it's also been a bit lonely. What a difference one letter makes!Anyway, I was thinking it would be great funto actually build the shoot around a real reception-style party!So, if you wouldn't mind Work your magic in here, and then we'll invite all of to join us!What do you think? Are you up for it?
Sounds like fun!
Let's do it.

You'll do it? Oh, that's so fun! What a good sport! <20_2 arg="5" /><20_2 arg="7" />Isn't this going to be incredible, darling?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_2 arg="8" />And we can help out too. You just do your thing with the set, and we'll take care of the invites, OK?Then, when everyone's here and everything is in place, would you mind staging the scene?Just open the Residents tab, and you can place folks wherever you like.
When you've got the set just the way you want it, we can get the party started.Just come talk to me, or press  when you're ready.
Oh, hello! Wasn't that party just the MOST fun? I can't thank you enough for everything!
Noticing that things look a little different in here today? Hee-hee!Well, I thought you did a great job with the cute theme we had going. And now it's time for something new!
Well, are you ready for another shoot? We sure are!We've been getting great stuff so far, so just keep doing what you do!

I've heard you're already a wiz at customization, but did you know that you can modify wedding items?Even just changing the color can completely change how an item feels on the set. It's so much fun!So, anyway I was thinking that you could make a new set for us today using some custom colors.To start customizing in the studio, just line the cursor up with an item and press .When you're done customizing, you can just build out the set the same way you've been doing it.And as for today's theme
Hey! So glad to see you again. Are you ready to work on another fun set for us?
And as for today's theme

Hey! So glad to see you again. Are you ready to work on another fun set for us?I have to say, I'm afraid I don't have any more special rewardsother than my gratitude.But Cy and I would simply love it if you're still willing to help!
I'm in!
I can't right now.
Aw, I understand. You've already done so much. <10_4 />Well, come on back another day if you feel like it!
Aw, I understand. You've already done so much. We can't thank you enough!
Ooh, I was hoping you'd say that!<10_4 /> In that case, let's talk themes
Ooh, I was hoping you'd say that!So, we're still looking for something really cute, with splashes of pink and white everywhere.Let's talk again after the photo session, OK?

Got all that? I hope I don't seem too particularit's just that we want everything to be exactly perfect!Not that our actual wedding wasn't perfect, butwhen you get a chance like this, you want to do it right!Oh, and like always, we'll need your artistic touch behind the lens of the camera too.
I'm gonna miss this darling set we've been shooting on, but we'll need to clear it out for the next one.
Ooh, it's coming along Does this mean you're ready for us to start the photo session?
Let's tie the knot!
Knot quite yet.

Yay! This is so exciting!Um, but before we get started, I do have another teensy request<10_4 /> Will you be our photographer?Don't get me wrong—Harvey is great! It's justthis lovely set is your vision, and I want YOU to realize it.So, when you're ready, just press  to launch the Camera app, and then press  to take a picture.If you find yourself in the frame and you don't want to be, press  to change what's shown in the frame.OK! I know we're asking a lot, but I also know you've got this. I can't wait to see what you come up with!

Once everything is ready, would you mind being our photographer again? You did such a nice job before!Just press  to open up the Camera app within the studio, and then press  to take photos, remember?Thanks again for all your hard work! I can't wait to see how these are going to turn out!
No problem. Keep up the good work!
Oh, that last one seemed nice! Mind if I take a quick peek?Did you take more than one? I'll just look at the last one, if that's OK.
Go ahead!
Let me take another.
Great! Now, let's see
Remember, when you're ready to start shooting, press  to open the Camera app, and  to take pictures.
If you're having a hard time staying out of the frame, press  to swap the display.
The lighting and composition are all up to you. Show us your full artistic vision!
Not sure how to get started? Press  to begin working on your set design and arranging furniture.
If you're feeling inspired to use some of your own props, please do so!I think my darling Cy-Guy's stuff is pretty great, but I'd love to see what you come up with!
Thinking of using some custom pieces? Line up your cursor with the item, and then press .
Today I'm looking for a photo set that feels like a real ceremony inside a wedding chapel!
Today I'm looking for a photo set that feels like the big, fun reception after a perfect wedding!

If I were planning our wedding reception all over againI'd find a place with room for all kinds of fancy decorationsand tables piled high with delicious food!Oh! And a wedding cake is an absolute must. Everyone gets a sliceor two!
We'd be a pack of happy alpacas if you made us a cute set with plenty of white and pink accents!
I'm thinking of something chic. You knowcalm and refined. With brown, beige, or black accents.
I want to get a photo in a garden settingwith vibrant natural colors like green, yellow, and brown!
Hmm It's good, but it's not quite what I was expecting.But that's OK! Thanks for sharing your artistic vision with us!
What a lovely photo! It really captures the feel we were looking for, and it's so sweet of you to help.
Oh. My. Goodness! It's everything I could have wanted!You've somehow captured all the joy and love that my darling and I share in one amazing photo. I love it!

If I could offer just one tiny bit of constructive criticismit felt a bit plain for a wedding set.But that's so easy to fix! Just adding more furniture to the scene would make it much fancier and more fun.
If there was one tiny thing I could change about itI'd try to match up the colors a little better.Just adding a few more splashes of the colors I mentioned before would do the trick, I think.
I do have just one helpful note for you Some of the furniture could have matched the theme a bit better.Maybe if you had used themed furniture, or customized the color of Cy-Guy's furniture to match
Anyway, I have a little something to show our appreciation. I hope you like it!My Cy-Guy made it just for you It's !
Oh! But you don't have any room to take it with you right now, do you? Well. I'll mail it to you first class.
Aaaandbecause I'm just full of surprises, I also have some heart crystals for you!
They're so cute that I just hate to give them away, but my Cy-Guy likes 'em too. He'll trade you for furniture!
Ooh, but you don't have any room for those either. How frustrating! Well, I'll pack those in with your gift.
Now, I can't let you leave without a reward. Treat yourself to something nice with these heart crystals!
Once again, thank you so much for everything. You helped us make a wonderful new memory!

You know, this was so fun Would you be interested in helping us out again tomorrow?We have the studio space rented for the entire month! Just think of all the different themes we could tryWell, no pressure, darling. But I do hope you'll consider it. Thanks again!
Well, that was so much fun, and we made another great photo.I hope you'll come back tomorrow for another shoot!
I already stashed your reward with your other stuff, so you're all set!
I already put those with your other stuff too. Hee-hee! I've got a few tricks up my sleeve.
Are we ready to get started?
Sure!
Not quite yet.
Yay! Here we go
Hmm, we can't have a party without guests That would be something else entirely!Why don't you call them up on the Residents tab and help them all get settled, OK?
Since we've already got company, should we go ahead and throw another party?Just press  if you think it's a good idea. A party is ALWAYS a good idea, if you ask me
Would you be a dear and wake my silly sleeping Cy-Guy before we start the party?
Hello, everyone!
I know you're all so, so hard at work back home, so I truly appreciate all of you taking the time to join us.

Today we're celebrating the love that my Cy-Guy and I share all over again!Now, I wish you all could have celebrated with us the first time, but I have to saythis is just as good!It makes me so happy to have all of you join us in this wonderful setting that worked on.Oh, I better stop before I get all weepy. <10_4 />Let's just all let down our hair and have a good time!
Nowdoes everyone have a party popper?
It's time to fire 'em off. Let's party! In three, two, one
Whee! That was great! Let's keep the party going, everyone!
Do you think we should wrap up the party?
Let's wrap it up.
Let's keep partying!
Oh, do you need to head out? I just wanted to wrap things up here first if so.So, shall I go ahead and do that? Or do you want to keep going?
Let's wrap it up.
Let's keep partying!

This is so much fun, don't you think? I feel like my Cy-Guy and I are newly married all over again! Oh, I know it can't go on forever, of course. Would you mind coming to see me when you're ready to go?No rush, no rush. Enjoy yourself for as long as you want!
I think you're right. Fun is fun, but knowing when to call it a day is important too.
That's the spirit! We don't do this EVERY day, so let's make the most of it, right?
Oh, that was just wonderful, wasn't it? Thank you, !
We have one more teensy thing for you It's nothing much, but I do hope you like it.
Please accept this with all of our love It's a commemorative Reese & Cyrus photo plate!
Please accept this with all of our love It's a commemorative Reese & Cyrus photo plate!Oh, but you don't have room to take it with you right now. That's OK—I'll make sure it gets to you.
I know it's a bit sentimental, but we just wanted a way to share our happiness with you.<20_1 arg="N0>N1" />Isn't that right, <20_1 arg="N1>N0" />darling?
Got that right! So long as you got that pretty li'l plate, you'll be as happy as me an' Reese here, squirt.
Yes! It's true! I mean, it's true if you believe in it, I think.

<20_1 arg="N1>N2" /><20_1 arg="N2>N0" />And we haven't forgotten about you, Harvey! Thank you so much for the use of your studio.We've got a special photo plate for you as well. It'll be ready for you soon!
Gee, uhthanks?<10_4 /> Play it cool, Harv Smile and nod and we'll hide it in a drawer later
Well, that's it for now. Of course, we'll be here all month, so we'd love to have your help again tomorrow!
Oh! Today is the last day of June, which meansour time here has come to an end. <10_4 />We'll miss you!
I really can't thank you enough for all of your help, . You've been wonderful!
I want to take a picture in a cute set!Thinkthe most adorable scene ever, surrounded by pink and white.<10_4 /> I'd be tickled pinkand white! Hee-hee!
I want to take a picture in a chic set.You knowbig-city sophistication, subtle hues of brown, beige, and black Got it?
I want to take a picture in a garden- themed set, surrounded by natureIt should be filled with gentle, natural colors like green, yellow, and brown. I can see it now
